element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm creates a new layer from an table containing X and Y coordinates of the points to create.

element.name: XFIELD
element.text: The field that contains the X coordinate.

element.name: YFIELD
element.text: The field that contains the X coordinate.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The attributes table of the resulting layer is exactly the same as the input table
